body:

subject: YC Winter 2025 Applications Open
body:
Hi Student Founder,

Applications are now open for Y Combinator's Winter 2025 batch!

Y Combinator is a startup accelerator that has funded over 4,000 companies including Airbnb, Stripe, Dropbox, and Reddit.

ğŸš€ Program Details:
- $500,000 investment
- 3 months in Silicon Valley
- Access to YC's network of founders and investors
- Weekly office hours with YC partners

ğŸ“ Apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexampleYCWinter2025/viewform

Deadline: December 15, 2024

Even if you're still in school, we encourage you to apply. Many successful YC companies were started by students.

Good luck!
Y Combinator Team

subject: Google Solution Challenge 2025
body:
Hello Developer!

We're excited to announce the Google Solution Challenge 2025!

Build a solution using Google technologies that addresses one or more of the United Nations' 17 Sustainable Development Goals.

ğŸŒ Impact Areas:
- No Poverty
- Zero Hunger
- Good Health and Well-being
- Quality Education
- And 13 more...

ğŸ Prizes:
- Grand Prize: $3,000 + Mentorship
- Top 50: Google swag + Cloud credits
- Top 10: Trip to Google I/O

ğŸ“± Required: Use Google Cloud, Firebase, Android, or other Google tech

ğŸ‘¥ Team size: 1-4 students

ğŸ”— Register your team: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexampleGoogleSolutionChallenge/viewform

Submission deadline: March 31, 2025

Let's build for good!
Google Developer Student Clubs

subject: Kleiner Perkins Fellows Program - Summer 2025
body:
Dear Student,

The Kleiner Perkins Fellows Program connects top engineering students with the most promising startups in Silicon Valley.

ğŸš€ Program Highlights:
- Work at a KP portfolio company (Stripe, DoorDash, etc.)
- Exclusive networking events with founders and VCs

- Competitive salary + equity

ğŸ‘¥ Community:
- Join 800+ KP Fellows alumni network

- Workshops on startups, VC, and careers

ğŸ“ Location: San Francisco Bay Area

ğŸ”— Application: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexampleKPFellows2025/viewform

Deadline: January 10, 2025

Looking for ambitious students ready to dive into the startup world.

Best,
KP Fellows Team
